trans-unit.source: Used to set the default loader optimization policy for the main method of an executable application.
trans-unit.target: Brukes til å angi laster optimalisering standardpolicyen for hoved-metoden til et kjørbart program.

trans-unit.source: The LoaderOptimizationAttribute can only be set on the main method for an executable application and is ignored on all other methods.
trans-unit.target: LoaderOptimizationAttribute kan bare angis for den primære metoden for et kjørbart program og ignoreres for alle andre metoder.

trans-unit.source: The LoaderOptimizationAttribute attribute is specified with a <xref:System.LoaderOptimization> enumeration value, which tells the loader what type of application to optimize for: `SingleDomain`, `MultiDomain`, or `MultiDomainHost`.
trans-unit.target: Attributtet LoaderOptimizationAttribute er angitt med en <xref:System.LoaderOptimization>opplistingsverdien som forteller lasteren hvilken type programmet til å optimalisere: `SingleDomain`, `MultiDomain`, eller `MultiDomainHost`.</xref:System.LoaderOptimization>

trans-unit.source: This attribute is only a hint to the loader and does not affect program behavior.
trans-unit.target: Dette attributtet er en referanse til lasteren og påvirker ikke programmet virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If custom code access security policy is set for the <xref:System.AppDomain>, by using the <xref:System.AppDomain.SetAppDomainPolicy%2A> property, and the <xref:System.AppDomain> is created using the <xref:System.LoaderOptimization> flag, the effect is the same as specifying the <xref:System.LoaderOptimization> flag; that is, only assemblies in the GAC are shared.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis egendefinert policy for kodetilgangssikkerhet er angitt for den <xref:System.AppDomain>, ved hjelp av den <xref:System.AppDomain.SetAppDomainPolicy%2A>egenskapen og <xref:System.AppDomain>opprettes ved hjelp av <xref:System.LoaderOptimization>flagg effekten er den samme som angir den <xref:System.LoaderOptimization>flagget; som er bare samlinger i GAC deles.</xref:System.LoaderOptimization> </xref:System.LoaderOptimization> </xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.AppDomain.SetAppDomainPolicy%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, the loader does not throw an exception and the application does not experience the performance gains associated with the <xref:System.LoaderOptimization> flag.
trans-unit.target: Når dette skjer, lasteren ikke iverksette et unntak, og programmet ikke oppleve de bedre knyttet til den <xref:System.LoaderOptimization>flagg.</xref:System.LoaderOptimization>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.LoaderOptimizationAttribute"></xref> class to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.LoaderOptimizationAttribute"> </xref> klassen til den angitte verdien.

trans-unit.source: A value equivalent to a <xref href="System.LoaderOptimization"></xref> constant.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som tilsvarer et <xref href="System.LoaderOptimization"> </xref> konstant.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.LoaderOptimizationAttribute"></xref> class to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.LoaderOptimizationAttribute"> </xref> klassen til den angitte verdien.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <xref href="System.LoaderOptimization"></xref> value for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende <xref href="System.LoaderOptimization"> </xref> verdien for denne forekomsten.
